trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> method that is called when a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call completes.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體傳遞至<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>時，會呼叫的方法<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>呼叫完成。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request asynchronously and wait for a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>方法以非同步方式傳送網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMP) 回應要求，並等候對應的 ICMP 回應回覆訊息。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> property contains the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>屬性包含 ICMP 回應要求的結果。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains data that describes an attempt to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request message and receive a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，包含描述嘗試傳送網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMP) 回應要求訊息及接收對應的 ICMP 回應回覆訊息的資料。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values that are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>不<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>，您不應該使用傳回的值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>， <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties will return zero, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>屬性會傳回零，而<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>屬性會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"></xref> object that describes the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"> </xref>物件，描述 ICMP 回應要求的結果。
